title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 202.6 - Volunteer cemetery maintenance and cleanup programs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 202.6 - Volunteer cemetery maintenance and cleanup programs

State Regulations
(a) Upon the request of a municipal
corporation, the Division of Cemeteries shall assist a municipal corporation in
the organization, implementation and administration of a volunteer cemetery
maintenance and cleanup program in an abandoned cemetery wholly contained
within such municipal corporation for which such municipal corporation has the
primary responsibility to provide care. (b) Assistance provided by the division shall
include, but shall not be limited to, the following: (1)
provide professional and technical
guidance; (2)
provide a listing of
service providers, such as historical monument restorers; and
(3)
provide written guidelines for general
maintenance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
202.6

Renumbered from 202.1

New

York State Register March 9, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 10, eff. 3/9/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
